trans-unit.source: Log in to the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com/) at http://portal.azure.com/.
trans-unit.target: Log in to the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com/) at http://portal.azure.com/.

trans-unit.source: In the left banner, click **BROWSE ALL**.
trans-unit.target: In the left banner, click **BROWSE ALL**.

trans-unit.source: The **Browse** blade is displayed.
trans-unit.target: The **Browse** blade is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Scroll and click **SQL servers**.
trans-unit.target: Scroll and click **SQL servers**.

trans-unit.source: The **SQL servers** blade is displayed.
trans-unit.target: The **SQL servers** blade is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Find your Azure SQL Database server in the portal
trans-unit.target: Find your Azure SQL Database server in the portal

trans-unit.source: For convenience, click the minimize control on the earlier **Browse** blade.
trans-unit.target: For convenience, click the minimize control on the earlier **Browse** blade.

trans-unit.source: In the filter text box, start typing the name of your server.
trans-unit.target: In the filter text box, start typing the name of your server.

trans-unit.source: Your row is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Your row is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Click the row for your server.
trans-unit.target: Click the row for your server.

trans-unit.source: A blade for your server is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A blade for your server is displayed.

trans-unit.source: On your server blade, click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: On your server blade, click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: The **Settings** blade is displayed.
trans-unit.target: The **Settings** blade is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Click **Firewall**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Firewall**.

trans-unit.source: The **Firewall Settings** blade is displayed.
trans-unit.target: The **Firewall Settings** blade is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Click Settings > Firewall
trans-unit.target: Click Settings > Firewall

trans-unit.source: Click **Add Client IP**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add Client IP**.

trans-unit.source: Type in a name for your new rule into the first text box.
trans-unit.target: Type in a name for your new rule into the first text box.

trans-unit.source: Type in the low and high IP address values for the range you want to enable.
trans-unit.target: Type in the low and high IP address values for the range you want to enable.

trans-unit.source: It can be handy to have the low value end with **.0** and the high with **.255**.
trans-unit.target: It can be handy to have the low value end with **.0** and the high with **.255**.

trans-unit.source: Add an IP address range to allow
trans-unit.target: Add an IP address range to allow

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.
